name: Mobinett Interactive
tag_list: mobile-development, web-development, social-integration, mobile, loyalty, rewards, gamification, game-mechanics, social-media, networking, crm
overview:
Mobinett Interactive, Inc. is a Boston startup specializing in designing, developing and deploying Location-enabled mobile and social platforms. Mobinett’s platforms incorporate social media, game mechanics and other features to provide users with engaging, fun and addictive experiences. Analytics track user activity, allowing calculation of ROI.

Mobinett’s flagship product is Plug, an events platform for companies and organizations that hold periodic events/conferences. Plug engages users with event content, social networking, polls and more.

HubEngage is a location-based, mobile social CRM product that enables brands and retailers to effectively engage and offer loyalty rewards to their customers.

Both platforms are available as white-labeled SaaS offerings through which clients can share and promote their social channels, products/services, news and other content, to engage customers and prospects.

Mobinett also does custom development for clients. Learn more at http://mobinett.com
